Summary: Very bright white light. at first we thought it was just an extremely bright star.
trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around August 6th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsVery bright white light. At first we thought it was just a really bright star. As we stood there we noticed that it was moving. We watched it as it kept a straight path. At one point we saw an airplane flying above the object. When they appeared to be close the object just flickered off. Then it came back on after it passed the airplane.
